description: No doxxing of any kind related to my irl name, account, etc. I am Yui here.
No racism, sexism, ableism, transphobia, homophobia, racial slurs, etc. An immediate ban if violated.
Do not talk about politics or religion.

shortName: NO IRRELEVANT POST IN WRONG CHANNEL
description: Please post to the appropriate channel to keep channel discussion relevant.
Do not buy/sell/trade/share accounts.
Do not spam chat. This includes bot commands, ping spamming, and images.

shortName: NO NSFW CONTENT OUTSIDE OF 18+ CHANNEL
description: Any NSFW content must be posted as a spoiler and only posted in the ðŸ”žï¸±chat channel.
No gory/disturbing content allowed in this channel. Immediate ban if this is violated.
Do not post any pictures of spiders in this server. I have severe arachnophobia. An immediate ban if violated.

shortName: NO RULE BREAKING EVEN IN #MEMES CHANNEL
description: Please do not post any racist/gory/or inappropriate content in ðŸ¤£ï¸±memes .

shortName: NO MENTION OF OTHER VTUBERS UNLESS ONGOING COLLAB
description: Do not speak of other Vtubers (exception: ongoing collabs).
No self advertisement allowed unless given the permission to.
No attention seeking, harassment, bullying, stirring up drama, or any other disruptive behavior.

shortName: ENGLISH AND KOREAN ONLY IN THEIR RESPECTIVE CHANNELS
description: Please keep English only in ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ï¸±general-english and Korean in ðŸ‡°ðŸ‡·ï¸±general-korean.

shortName: NO BADMOUTHING OR SLANDERING OTHER PEOPLE
description: Do not speak negatively about other streamers, content creators, and anybody in general.
Do not share personal information. Any attempts will be an immediate ban.
Please ping me only if it's an emergency. Otherwise, only mods may ping me if needed.

shortName: NO SHARING OF DISCORD INVITE LINK TO OUTSIDERS
description: This is not a public server and is for my community. Please do not send invite links to random people who do not watch my content.
ONLY ENGLISH OR KOREAN
No doxxing allowed even if you know my irl name. (Please call me Yui here)
Don't mention other streamers unless I do first.
Please don't mention viewer count.
No self promotion.
NO SPOILERS when we're talking about animes/movies/shows/dramas and during watch parties.
I'm bad at reading chat so you can spam until I read what you say but don't spam excessively.
No politics, religion, homophobia, transphobia, racial slurs, etc.

shortName: NO RUDE OR MEAN BEHAVIOR IN CHAT
description: Don't be rude or mean to me and others in chat.
